# controlPointBuffers

**Instance Property**

Assigns a reference to a buffer where each entry contains a reference to a buffer of control points.

## Declaration

```swift
var controlPointBuffers: MTL4BufferRange { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property references a buffer that conceptually represents an array with one entry for each keyframe in the motion animation. Each one of these entries consists of a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4BufferRange] that, in turn, references a buffer containing the control points corresponding to the keyframe.

You are responsible for ensuring the buffer address is not zero for the top-level buffer, as well as for all the vertex buffers it references.
